summary: Flirtatious mermaid Miranda (Glynis Johns) swaps places with a schoolteacher who has gone on vacation. All is well until she falls in love with a human.
cast: Glynis Johns|Donald Sinden|Anne Crawford|Margaret Rutherford|Dora Bryan|Nicholas Phipps|Peter Martyn|Noel Purcell|Joan Hickson|Judith Furse|Irene Handl|David Hurst|Martin Miller|Deryck Guyler|Anthony Oliver|Marianne Stone|Lawrence Ward|Wendie Adams|Hyma Beckley|Martin Boddey|Stringer Davis|Meredith Edwards|Lucy Griffiths|Victor Harrington|Damaris Hayman|John Horsley|Joan Ingram|Douglas Ives|Henry B. Longhurst|Gibb McLaughlin|Dandy Nichols|Jim O'Brady|Ken Richmond|Sandra Walden|Harry Welchman|Jane White|George Woodbridge
keywords: same actor playing two characters|identical relatives|doppleganger|switching places|underwater treasure
title: Loca por los hombres
